titleStmt.title: Lucius Annæus Seneca, the philosopher, his booke of the shortnesse of life translated into an English poem.
De brevitate vitae. English
titleStmt.author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
Freeman, Ralph, Sir, fl. 1610-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Daniel Frere, at the red Bull in little Britaine,

notesStmt.note: Translation attributed to Sir Ralph Freeman--Cf. Wing and STC (2nd ed.)
